entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 11:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -33.4°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -37.5°C
Wind: ESE 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 49 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
